Customer ratings by feature

Additional details

Get warmth whenever and wherever you want it with the SunTouch SunStat Command Touchscreen Thermostat, an industry-leading thermostat that combines SmartStart technology with intuitive design, automatically adjusting when the floor warming system turns on and ensuring optimal comfort and convenience in any space.
Equipped with a vibrant 3.5" digital touchscreen, this thermostat features a sleek, thin profile, a large, easy-to-read portrait display, and a choice of five preset color themes to suit your aesthetic preferences. You can also customize further by painting the retractable beauty ring to match your room's décor.
But the SunStat Command isn't just attractive; it boasts a number of useful features to enhance your heating experience, including smart floor and air sensor modes, intuitive 7-day programmable schedule, an ‘away' feature, energy use monitoring, programming setup wizard, and comprehensive help screens for easy troubleshooting. Ensuring a flawless heating experience, this thermostat is compatible with any electric radiant floor heating system and seamlessly accommodates both 120 and 240 V with GFCI for unparalleled safety.
SunTouch provides a wide range of electric floor heating and snow melting systems that are widely used in residential, commercial, and institutional projects to create comfortable, warm, safe, inviting spaces. With more than 30 years of experience in electric radiant heating, we are proud to deliver quality products, simple-design services, and world-class support.

From the manufacturer

SunTouch SunStat Core Non-Programmable Thermostat

The SunStat Core Non-Programmable Thermostat has less features but is ideal for simple home temperature adjustments.

  • Compatible with 120 and 240 voltage
  • GFCI for safety
  • 15 amp maximum load
  • Built-in relay system

SunTouch Command Touchscreen Programmable Thermostat

The SunTouch Command Touchscreen Programmable Thermostat uses SmartStart technology that allows you to program start times, to ensure your floor is warmed and ready to go! This Thermostat is compatible with 120 and 240 Volt and includes GFCI for safety. Features include:

  • Smart floor and air sensor modes
  • Intuitive 7-day programmable schedule, including an 'away' feature
  • Programming setup wizard
  • Comprehensive help screens for troubleshooting

SunTouch ConnectPlus Programmable Smart Thermostat

Elevate your floor heating with the SunTouch ConnectPlus Smart Thermostat, designed for modern living and home automation. Includes:

  • Set schedules, monitor outdoor temperatures, and program remotely with Wi-Fi capabilities
  • Sleek 4.3-inch touchscreen with three home screen options
  • Monitor energy use, receive notifications, and access away mode features
  • Includes heat output tracking, voltage detector, and diagnostic screen

SunTouch CommandPlus Programmable Smart Thermostat

The SunTouch SunStat CommandPlus Smart Thermostat blends modern design and advanced technology. Includes:

  • 4.3-inch touchscreen with sleek, user-friendly interface
  • Wi-Fi access for remote programming and control via mobile app
  • Floor and air sensing control, energy monitoring, and 7-day programmable schedule
  • Features include outdoor temperature display, warm weather shutdown, and email alerts

Go for PLUS

The SunTouch ConnectPlus and CommandPlus Thermostats offer robust Wi-Fi capabilities, allowing remote temperature control and scheduling via the Watts Home mobile app for iOS and Android. Additionally, users can track energy use, receive notifications, and manage settings both locally and remotely. With three home screen options—clock, control settings, or weather—you can easily customize your experience. The thermostats also offer flexible mounting options and advanced features like automatic temperature compensation and maximum floor temperature protection.

For even more capabilities. choose ConnectPlus which can integrate with Amazon Alexa and Hey Google for voice commands.

Feel the SUN

All four thermostats are compatible with both 120 and 240 volts and include a GFCI for safety. They also feature built-in relay systems to ensure reliable operation. Each thermostat is designed to simplify temperature control, with varying levels of programmability and functionality to suit different needs. Additionally, they all offer robust safety features and user-friendly interfaces to enhance comfort and convenience in home temperature management.

From the brand

  1. Who We Are

    We provide a wide range of electric floor heating and snow melting systems that are widely used in residential, commercial, and institutional projects to create comfortable, warm, safe, inviting spaces. With more than 30 years of experience in electric radiant heating, we are proud to deliver quality products, simple-design services, and world-class support.

  2. What makes our products unique?

    We provide adaptable, high quality heating solutions that are easy to install and inexpensive to use. We also provide top-of-the-line service and support that you can depend on.

    What problem are we solving?

    Chilly floors during the winter can be uncomfortable. For over 30 years, SunTouch has helped millions of homeowners feel comfortable in their homes with affordable floor warming solutions.

    Why Choose SunTouch?

    - Trusted by 1+ Million Households

    - Making warm & cozy floors for over 30 years

    - Peace of mind with technical & customer support

  3. All-In-One Control

    We take pride in designing all of our products to work seamlessly with one another. Find the right products to fit your every need.

  4. Easy Floor Warming Control

    Visit the Store

  5. Safety First Accessories

    Our LoudMouth monitors heating elements during the installation process and sounds an alarm if the heating elements are cut or damaged.

      5.0 out of 5 starsVerified Purchase
      Seamless Upgrade for Heated Floors
      Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
      Style: Basic Programmable
      recently replaced my old SunTouch control panel with the SunTouch Command Touchscreen Programmable Thermostat, and I was amazed at how quickly my heated floors were up and running again. Installing the new thermostat was a breeze. The instructions were clear, and... See more
      recently replaced my old SunTouch control panel with the SunTouch Command Touchscreen Programmable Thermostat, and I was amazed at how quickly my heated floors were up and running again.

      Installing the new thermostat was a breeze. The instructions were clear, and within minutes, I had the new unit installed and ready to go. The compatibility between my old system and the new thermostat was impressive.

      The performance of the SunTouch Command Thermostat was outstanding. Once I turned it on, the heated floors responded immediately. The temperature control was precise, maintaining a consistent level of warmth throughout the day. The programmable settings allowed me to customize the heating schedule to my liking.

      The touchscreen interface was intuitive and easy to navigate. Even as someone who isn't very tech-savvy, I had no trouble adjusting settings or programming the thermostat. The display was well-organized, making it simple to understand.

      The design of the thermostat blended well with my home environment. The responsive touchscreen and adequately sized display were notable features, though slightly larger text would have been appreciated for better visibility from a distance.

      In conclusion, the SunTouch Command Touchscreen Programmable Thermostat breathed new life into my heated floors. Its straightforward installation, accurate performance, and user-friendly interface make it an excellent choice for upgrading your heating control system. If you're looking for an efficient and convenient way to manage the temperature of your heated floors, the SunTouch Command Thermostat is a solid recommendation.

      We looked at various thermostats for our heated bathroom floor system, but the combination of the well-known brand name of SunTouch and their reasonably-priced option was an easy sell for us. It arrived quickly and in good condition, in the original box with instructions printed in three languages, along with a few other bits of printed ephemera. The install kit also came with a coiled up heat sensor wire, wire nuts, screws for attaching to the electrical box and a teeny weeny screwdriver for tightening the teeny weeny screws that secure the sensor wires to the back of the unit.

      The installation of the thermostat is straightforward and easy, assuming you've done a good job preparing for it with a 4x4 electrical box, conduit for the wires to go to the floor, and proper wiring for power.

      Setting up the system once it was all connected and turned on is beautifully intuitive. the screen is bright and clear, easy to read and use.

      I should mention that the floor heat system in the floor is not a SunTouch product, but they seem to work together without a hiccup, no problem at all.

      We have a heated floor! Thanks!

    • JdeF
      5.0 out of 5 starsVerified Purchase
      A Little Bit of Need, A Lot Bit of Want
      Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2025
      Style: Wi-Fi & Alexa Enabled Touchscreen Programmable
      A few weeks ago I finally managed to replace my old-school programmable house thermostat with one that was Wi-Fi enabled. It got me thinking about the thermostat for my heated flooring in my main bathroom. The existing floor thermostat worked mostly fine, although like my... See more
      A few weeks ago I finally managed to replace my old-school programmable house thermostat with one that was Wi-Fi enabled. It got me thinking about the thermostat for my heated flooring in my main bathroom. The existing floor thermostat worked mostly fine, although like my old-school programmable house thermostat, the scheduling function was very limited. It only allowed for two distinct programs (Mon-Fri and Sat-Sun). It also only allowed for four temperature changes during the day.

      It dawned on me that I might be able to replace the floor thermostat with one that was also Wi-Fi enabled, which I hoped could give me more flexibility in scheduling as well as the ability to turn it on and off online. My existing thermostat was by SunTouch and I will admit, I didn't see any reason to switch to a different company, especially when I had been very happy with the performance of the existing thermostat. Some online research and a couple of messages exchanged with SunTouch representatives confirmed that it would be very quick and easy to replace my existing thermostat without having to do any additional wiring.

      There are two different versions that are Wi-Fi enabled, CommandPlus and ConnectPlus. I originally had planned to get the cheaper one (CommandPlus) because I didn't really think I needed to be able to pair it with my Alexa units, but when I went to purchase it, the price difference was about eight dollars, so I upgraded to the ConnectPlus. In the end, I am glad I did as it seems like the free app offered by SunTouch (Watts Home App) actually still limited me to the same scheduling limits of the existing thermostat.

      In total, it probably took me about 30 minutes to swap out the thermostat, which included a few trips back and forth between the breaker box to make sure power was off and then on again. One of the hardest parts was maneuvering to get the wires attached into the new thermostat as the wires inside the electrical box were a bit short.

      Pairing it with my Alexa was a little tricky, mainly because the webpage with the instructions was a broken link, but I later found a different link that worked. After I got that linked, I was able to set scheduled "routines" for each segment of any given day of the week. I also have a routine for when I leave the house that changes the set temperature lower. I can trigger any of the routines in the Alexa app on my phone or by voice command in the app or on any of the Alexa devices around my house. I will be adding additional routines that can be triggered for when I am leaving on vacation or returning home.

      All in all, did I need to be able to connect my floor heating thermostat to Wi-Fi/Alexa...no. Am I happy to have this option...heck yeah! I do anticipate some minor cost savings as long as I am managing the temperature based on being at home or away. It probably won't equal the cost of the thermostat itself, but it will reduce my energy consumption and that's never a bad thing.

      As a side note, it is not clearly stated, but there is no "subscription" fee for either the free app or linking to Alexa. I believe it also works with Google Home. That was a nice bonus since a lot of these smart devices require an annual subscription to get real value out of the product.

    • Rolidnot
      5.0 out of 5 starsVerified Purchase
      Excellent replacement for legacy Suntouch LS120 and others
      Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
      Style: Basic Programmable
      1.
      Simple install, 4 power wires (2 line, 2 load) and 2 temperature sensor wires. I killed the power, removed the 15+ year old Suntouch LS120 thermostat and had this new upgraded version installed in 10 minutes. Turned the breaker back on and the new touch screen is... See more
      Simple install, 4 power wires (2 line, 2 load) and 2 temperature sensor wires. I killed the power, removed the 15+ year old Suntouch LS120 thermostat and had this new upgraded version installed in 10 minutes.

      Turned the breaker back on and the new touch screen is beautiful, easy to read, simple to program and a major improvement over the far more rudimentary LS120 that was annoying to program.

      I have Flextherm floors at another location and this Suntouch model worked perfectly on those floors as well. It’s the same wiring process between the Suntouch and Flextherm- 2 load, 2 line and the 2 sensor wires

      I’m not sure why the Suntouch sensor wires are so fine and such a small gauge, that was the only annoying part of the installation, it was like wiring in frog’s hair. I wound folded the sensor wires and doubled them up when I screwed them in place.

      I connected the heavier line and load wires first before the sensor wires so I didn’t tear the fine sensor wires out of the back of the new thermostat.

      The photos show the this new Suntouch alone and with the old LS120. The other photo is the back of the old LS120 thermostat which is almost identical to the new back panel, the wires locations are just a bit different. Just read the wire location labels and you’re all set.

      Just be sure to turn the power off. If you’re not comfortable doing this sort of work, hire a trained pro.

      The only other minor issue I encountered with the first new Suntouch thermostat I bought from Amazon was that when it arrived, the box was mangled and wires ends were bent up like they had been previously connected. It was NOT new. I returned it to Amazon, asked for a exact replacement and that replacement arrived the next day in perfectly new condition.

      I’ll see how long this new Suntouch thermostats lasts. Otherwise, this is a great product! Hope that helps!
